languages.text: Вскоре шум боя стих, и солдаты осторожно продвинулись вперед, где их ждала жуткая находка.
The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.
languages.original_text: Вскоре шум боя стих, и солдаты осторожно продвинулись вперед, где их ждала жуткая находка.

traits.locale_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.
The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.
The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.
The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

languages.text: 战斗的喧嚣很快便平息下来。士兵们战战兢兢地慢慢前进，最终看到了恐怖的一幕。
languages.original_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

traits.locale_text: 战斗的喧嚣很快便平息下来。士兵们战战兢兢地慢慢前进，最终看到了恐怖的一幕。

languages.text: 騒々しい戦闘の声はたちまち収まっていく。兵士たちは用心しながら前方へとゆっくり進むが、現場で陰惨なものを発見することになる。
languages.original_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

traits.locale_text: 騒々しい戦闘の声はたちまち収まっていく。兵士たちは用心しながら前方へとゆっくり進むが、現場で陰惨なものを発見することになる。

languages.text: El clamor de la batalla se apaga rápidamente y los soldados avanzan con cautela... hasta que se topan con un grotesco descubrimiento.
languages.original_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

traits.locale_text: El clamor de la batalla se apaga rápidamente y los soldados avanzan con cautela... hasta que se topan con un grotesco descubrimiento.

languages.text: Le fracas du combat cesse rapidement et les soldats avancent avec méfiance jusqu'au lieu de la bataille, où les attend une découverte macabre.
languages.original_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

traits.locale_text: Le fracas du combat cesse rapidement et les soldats avancent avec méfiance jusqu'au lieu de la bataille, où les attend une découverte macabre.

languages.text: Der Kampflärm verstummt rasch, und die Soldaten arbeiten sich langsam nach vorne, als sich ihnen ein schrecklicher Anblick bietet.
languages.original_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

traits.locale_text: Der Kampflärm verstummt rasch, und die Soldaten arbeiten sich langsam nach vorne, als sich ihnen ein schrecklicher Anblick bietet.

languages.text: Savaş sesleri hızla kesiliyor. Dehşet verici gerçekle gözleri buluşan askerler, ihtiyatla ilerliyor.
languages.original_text: The clamour of battle quickly dies down, and the soldiers warily creep forward, where a gruesome discovery is revealed to their eyes.

traits.locale_text: Savaşın sesleri hızla kesildi ve askerler ihtiyatla ilerlediler. Gözleri, dehşet verici gerçekle buluştu.
